title: Is Mookie Betts better than Albert Pujols? - Quora

response.answer_text: MooKie Betts no question. Albert pujols stayed hurt. His defense was average at best. All he could do was hit home runs. He couldn't run worth a shit. That's why he went to Anaheim in the American League so he could prolong his career by being a designated hitter.

No. At least, not yet. Pujols’ first eight years are very comparable to Mike Trout’s. Trout has been better than Mookie. Mookie isn’t far behind, but I think he is behind. He may well are better than Pujols and have an argument at some point of having a better career than Pujols, but that’s far from a sure thing.
